title: What would you call the Hand of Noxus when he has a 50% win rate?
body:
http://ddragon.leagueoflegends.com/cdn/img/champion/splash/Darius_0.jpg

Fair-ius

What if he has an uncommonly low play rate?

Rare-ius

What would you call him if he had a 100% slow?

Snare-ius

What do you call him when he's fed?

Scary-us

What should _you_ be when he's fed?

Wary-us

What do you call his residence?

Lair-ius

What if there's two of them?

Pair-ius

What if one of them is a backup?

Spare-ius

What if he's watching something intently?

Stare-ius

What if he grows out his mane?

Hairy-us

What if he were a female horse?

Mare-ius

What if he's a magical creature?

Fairy-us

What if he were a carnivorous mammal?

Bear-ius

What if he were an undertaker?

Bury-us

What if he were a fruit?

Pear-ius

What if he vaporized?

Air-ius

What if he's feeling generous?

Share-ius

What about when he's joyful?

Merry-us

What if he was religious?

Prayer-ius

What if you used him to ascend floors?

Stair-ius

What if you sit on him?

Chair-ius

What if he were an icecream topping?

Cherry-us

What if he were icecream?

Dairy-us

What do you call his bling?

Flair-ius

What if he's burning brightly?

Flare-ius

What if he's an obnoxious reflection?

Glare-ius

What if he's controlling another character in the game?

Player-ius

http://i1.kym-cdn.com/entries/icons/original/000/005/342/129969639840.gif

**EDIT:**

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Hjarta,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=hAVA3dOx,comment-id=000a,timestamp=2017-03-29T03:46:30.977+0000)
> 
> What if he is 5-0 and his team is doing poorly?
> 
> Carry-ius

---

> [{quoted}](name=SzGamer227,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=hAVA3dOx,comment-id=000f0001,timestamp=2017-03-29T17:19:26.807+0000)
>
> What if he gets 8 or more kills without dying?
> 
> Legendary-us
> 
> ---
> 
> What if he's about to be wed?
> 
> Marry-us
> 
> What if he makes a sudden loud sound?
> 
> Blare-ius
> 
> What if he's a rabbit-like creature?
> 
> Hare-ius
> 
> What if he is next to inherit a title or position?
> 
> Heir-ius
> 
> What if he rends flesh, paper or fabric?
> 
> Tear-ius
> 
> What if you inquire about his location?
> 
> Where-ius
> 
> What if he deflects a blow and ripostes?
> 
> Parry-us
> 
> What if he has four equal sides and angles?
> 
> Square-ius
> 
> What if he's a treeless grassland?
> 
> Prairie-us
> 
> What if he's a rowboat?
> 
> Wherry-us

---

> [{quoted}](name=SeaWyrm,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=hAVA3dOx,comment-id=000f,timestamp=2017-03-29T06:07:17.633+0000)
>
> What if you're using him to pay for the bus?
> 
> Fare-ius
> 
> What if he's completely nude?
> 
> Bare-ius
> 
> What if he used to be the Prime Minister of the UK?
> 
> Blair-ius
> 
> What if he turns into a wolf every full moon?
> 
> Were-ius
> 
> What if eagles roost on him?
> 
> Aviary-us
> 
> What if he's small, round, juicy, and grows on a plant?
> 
> Berry-us

---

> [{quoted}](name=Elikain,realm=EUNE,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=hAVA3dOx,comment-id=0014,timestamp=2017-03-29T15:47:28.725+0000)
>
> What do you call a swimming Darius?
> 
> Aqua-rius

---

> [{quoted}](name=The Yetii Rider,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=hAVA3dOx,comment-id=0017,timestamp=2017-03-29T17:51:03.031+0000)
>
> What do you call him if he has a potty mouth?
> 
> Swear-ius
> 
> How about if he's really angry?
> 
> Glare-ius
> 
> If you come to gank, but he's warded?
> 
> Aware-ius

---

> [{quoted}](name=EdenEntern,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=hAVA3dOx,comment-id=001a,timestamp=2017-03-29T21:06:47.936+0000)
>
> What if he's the pet of a sponge under the sea?
> 
> Gary-us

---

> [{quoted}](name=The Ender Cobra,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=hAVA3dOx,comment-id=001c,timestamp=2017-03-29T22:37:08.570+0000)
>
> What if you don't know where he is?
> 
> Where's Perry-us

---

> [{quoted}](name=Magus7a,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=hAVA3dOx,comment-id=0019,timestamp=2017-03-29T21:06:16.961+0000)
>
> What do you call him when he's all of the above?
> 
> Various

replies.body:
Here's my mediocre contribution:

What if he is 5-0 and his team is doing poorly?
Carry-ius

This whole post feels so wrong but so right at the same time.
I like you.
I like you too Amazox :)
I'm shiping it

Haha 
That actually was pretty 
Hilar-i(o)us

dunkeronni >_> 


i regret nothing

#What do you call a swimming Darius?

What if you don't know where he is?

What if he turns into a wolf every full moon?

What if he's small, round, juicy, and grows on a plant?

...idk
Nope, it's Eyrie-us, not Aviary-us... although I guess that would work too?
Ok, what was the round, juicy plant one?
Berry-us. :3

What if he got was standing really close to the edge of a drop?

Precar-ius.

What do you call a Noxian who likes his milk?

Darius.

**SHUT UP I THOUGHT IT WAS FUNNY**

What if he's the pet of a sponge under the sea?

Gary-us

What do you call him when he's all of the above:
Vario-us

What do you call him if he has a potty mouth?

Swear-ius

How about if he's really angry?

Glare-ius

If you come to gank, but he's warded?

Aware-ius

_Glare_

_...ius..._

I thought this was going to be a Darius main begging for a buff.

Then I saw memes and games.

Then I saw the contents of the post.

Then I saw my hand slowly moving to the upvote button.
Indeed, hilar-ius.

> What if he proves Alistar wrong?
>
> Dairy-us

FTFY
Darius _can_ milk those
God, thanks for giving me this horrible picture in my head
